settings.desc:
Core shaders can be used to add variation to lava, massively improving the look of large lava lakes.

This is INCOMPATIBLE with mods that override the solid shader. Do NOT use this option together with mods like Sodium, or with shaderpacks.

options.name: Disabled
options.desc: Vanilla-style lava with a custom texture.

options.name: Enabled
options.desc: Uses core shaders to randomize the texture and animation of lava.

settings.desc: Dokucraft uses post shaders to draw anything the pack needs in the sky without requiring any mods like Optifine. Here you can select what to draw in the sky at night. These effects require the Fabulous graphics setting. If you are using Optifine, disable Custom Sky in the in-game options to see the shader sky.

options.name: Skybox
options.desc: Uses post shaders to draw a custom static skybox.

options.name: Procedural Starfield
options.desc: Uses post shaders to generate stars and nebulae without using any textures.

settings.desc: Auroras are beautiful lights that can be seen in the sky near the poles of the planet during solar storms. This effect can be enabled in Dokucraft, but it can significantly lower the performance unless you have a powerful GPU.
Choose a color for the auroras.
